adDetails: Our cleaning service features cleaners who specialize in move out clean up services. Our professional cleaning staff will handle all of the deep cleaning that needs to be done to leave your house glistening. BATHROOM AREAS Tiles, walls and Bathtubs/Shower Cleaned and Disinfected Clean Cabinets/Drawers Inside & Outside Baseboards Cleaned Sink and Counters Cleaned and Disinfected Toilets Clean and Disinfect Cobwebs Removed Shine and Clean Chrome Fixtures Floors Washed and Disinfected Mirrors Cleaned and Shined Clean Window/Window Sills and Tracks KITCHEN AREA Scrub Clean Sink & Disinfected Baseboards Cleaned Refrigerator Cleaned Inside/Outside Range/Oven Cleaned Inside/Outside Countertops and Backsplash Cleaned and Disinfected Dishwasher Cleaned Inside/Outside and Disinfected Remove Cobwebs Floors Swept/Mopped Clean Inside and Outside of Microwave Clean Outside and Inside Cabinets and Drawers Shine Clean and Disinfected Clean refrigerator interior Clean Window/Window Sills and Tracks FAMILY ROOM - BEDROOMS - LIVING ROOM Carpets Vacuumed and Edged Baseboards Cleaned Stairs Cleaned Remove Cobwebs Clean all Ceiling Fans and Light Fixtures Clean Closet/Shelves Sweep/Mop Hard Surfaces Clean Window/Window Sills and Tracks Our Chicago move out cleaning services will do all the dirty work to prepare your space for the movers so you can begin the leg of your journey to your new home or apartment with piece of mind. Our move out cleaning services consists of everything in a routine cleaning, plus deep cleaning of the baseboards, oven, stove, refrigerator, ceiling fans, and cabinets and drawers. We provide all the necessary cleaning supplies
